title: Weight training for sport
creator_credit: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
brief_description: The National Coach to the British Amateur Weight-lifting Authority, Mr Al Murray, instructs pupils at a London gymnasium in weight training techniques. Demonstrates how the correct exercises can increase athletic proficiency in all fields of sporting endeavour.
creator_credit_for_label: Town and Country Productions and Bill Latto
